articles.title: Transaction in Own Shares
articles.summary: GlobeNewswire: Transaction in Own Shares. DIVERSIFIED ENERGY COMPANY ("Diversified", or the "Company") DIVERSIFIED ENERGY COMPANY (NYSE:DEC; LSE:DEC) announces that, in accordance with the terms of its share buyback program announced on March 20, 2025, the Company has purchased 54,988 shares of common stock, par value $0.01 per share of the Company (the "Shares") in the market at a volume-weighted average price of $13.9712 per Share through Mizuho Securities USA LLC (MSUSA). The Shares acquired will, in due course, be cancelled. Aggrega Related tickers mentioned: DEC.

articles.title: Trump’s Fed Chair Pick Puts Bessent in the Crosshairs. What He Has to Lose.
articles.mainIdea: Trump’s Fed Chair Pick Puts Bessent in the Crosshairs. What He Has to Lose.
articles.summary: Barrons.com: Trump’s Fed Chair Pick Puts Bessent in the Crosshairs. What He Has to Lose.. Scott Bessent has offered up candidates who share his vision of lower rates and cooperation with the White House. It could all backfire.

articles.title: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets
articles.mainIdea: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets
articles.summary: Financial Times: Tech groups shift $120bn of AI data centre debt off balance sheets. Tech companies have moved more than $120bn of data centre spending off their balance sheets using special purpose vehicles funded by Wall Street... Related tickers mentioned: CRWV, JPM, META, ORCL, XAAI.PVT.
